title: The Immortals: A Vampire Fairytale, Episode 1
description: When an ancient vampire's past collides with a young woman's future, sparks fly.He is bound by an ancient curse. She is the object of his affection. In the heat of the moment, Michael makes a decision that will unleash an evil on the small town of Shadow Hills, Oregon—forever changing the course of Kate Sheridan’s life.
author: Auburn Seal
